channel.title: Char resetting
channel.description: im using project 16 v6 and i have found a bug. If anyone uses the wrong password when trying to log in, their account is reset and the password is changed to the wrong password. Does anyone have a fix for this? I really need help..

item.title: Char resetting
item.dc:creator: @blazefire blazefire
item.description:
@blazefire wrote:

[quote=“anarchy, post:11, topic:106643”]everything about project 16 is buggy[/quote]no spam please. i need help with this problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Char resetting
item.dc:creator: @blazefire blazefire
item.description:
@blazefire wrote:

[quote=“dbmain, post:8, topic:106643”]add it in after the returncode = 2; right abovr that should be outStream.packetEncryption = outStreamDecryption; but right after that returncode - 2; add that code in.[/quote] i get this error client.java:10297: cannot find symbol symbol : variable loadgame location: class client if(!playerPass.equals(loadgame.p layerPass)) ^

Read full topic

item.title: Char resetting
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

Project 16 v6 is Cheezscape 78 if anyone was wondering. All the other Project 16’s are whitescape.

Read full topic

item.title: Char resetting
item.dc:creator: @dbmain dbmain
item.description:
@dbmain wrote:

add it in after the returncode = 2; right abovr that should be outStream.packetEncryption = outStreamDecryption; but right after that returncode - 2; add that code in.

Read full topic

item.title: Char resetting
item.dc:creator: @blazefire blazefire
item.description:
@blazefire wrote:

[quote=“dbmain, post:6, topic:106643”]hybridscape does that too but try adding in

if ((!playerPass.equals(loadgame.playerPass)) { returnCode = 3; playerName = ""; disconnected = true; teleportToX = 0; teleportToY = 0; }[/quote]
didnt work…

Read full topic

item.title: Char resetting
item.dc:creator: @dbmain dbmain
item.description:
@dbmain wrote:

hybridscape does that too but try adding in

if ((!playerPass.equals(loadgame.playerPass)) { returnCode = 3; playerName = ""; disconnected = true; teleportToX = 0; teleportToY = 0; }

Read full topic

item.title: Char resetting
item.dc:creator: @blazefire blazefire
item.description:
@blazefire wrote:

[quote=“bmxr4c3r709, post:4, topic:106643”]Tell them to try and using there other password, the first one they had, cause if they use a different password, but the same username, it should make a whole new account, not reset it.[/quote] nope. it overwrites the old account

Read full topic

item.title: Char resetting

item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Tell them to try and using there other password, the first one they had, cause if they use a different password, but the same username, it should make a whole new account, not reset it.
